alert.note: Alert for Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dixie County through 1245 PM EDT... At 1213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Cross City, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fletcher. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
